main event: An unidentified flying object was detected on radar moving rapidly and then disappearing without sound in Kansas City.
interesting points: The sighting was recorded via ground-radar,The observation lasted 5-6 minutes,The object moved more quickly than an aircraft or airliner,The object made a sharp turn and then went out of sight,There were no confirmed photographs associated with the report.
witness description: Civilian: Mr. State Avenue, Age: 24, Occupation: Arc Welder
